mapper.update: update requestboard set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where seq = #{seq}
update requestboard set reply=#{reply} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: delete from requestboard where seq in #{i.seq}
mapper.select: select * from requestboard order by 1 desc
select count(reply) from requestboard where seq=#{seq}
select * from (select requestboard.*,row_number() over(order by write_date desc) rn from requestboard) where rn between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
mapper.update: update requestboard set view_count=#{view_count} where seq=#{seq}
